instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..
definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.3V42_G3H: What is 3V42_G3H? This is shorthand for PP3V42_G3H which is one of the first power rails that must turn on in older Macbooks that use a magsafe charger in order for them to get a light on the charger. This power rail powers the onewire circuit and the SMC, which are necessary for the machine to communicate with the charger and get it to turn on, as well as begin the bootup sequence. .

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Power
threads.message:
Hi, I have an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B that has a strange behavier. Sometimews it powers on OK, and other times it dosen't power on. Some times I get green light on the charger, and other times i don't. Sometimes I only get green light with the charger in one position (If fliped the cable) it donÂ´t get green light, but sometimes the mac powers on even so.

Sometimes it boots pushing the power button and other times it only boots connecting the charger.

First it wasen' powering on at all, and the client said that it happend after a fall. I already replaced the SMC, and it started to power on- Then  I replaced the battery, but it has the same behavier. It seams to first happend, when it goes out of battery.

Sometimes the battery apears with 100% charge, and afetr a reboot it has 35%, 15, 20...

Can you help?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Power
threads.message:
Possibly broken solders/traces.
Did you test the board alone on the desk (w/ and w/o LIO flex connected)?
When no Magsafe light, do you still have <SIGNAL>3V42_G3H</SIGNAL> and <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> present (not only sometimes)?
